title: FiveThirtyEight - Wikipedia
snippet: The site's new owner, Disney, hired G. Elliott Morris to develop a new model. On September 18, 2023, the original website domain at fivethirtyeight.com was closed, with web traffic becoming redirected to ABC News pages, and its logo was replaced, with the name 538 used instead of FiveThirtyEight.

title: Nate Silver - Wikipedia
snippet: On July 22, 2013, ESPN (a subsidiary of the Walt Disney Company) announced that it had acquired ownership of the FiveThirtyEight website and brand, and that "Silver will serve as editor-in-chief of the site and will build a team of journalists, editors, analysts and contributors in the coming ...

title: Publishers Daily: ABC News Buys 'FiveThirtyEight'
snippet: ESPN has sold the FiveThirtyEight site to ABC News. FiveThirtyEight, which covers sports, politics and science, will continue to provide data-driven sports coverage to ESPN. The new ownership means FiveThirtyEight will expand its political coverage ...

title: FiveThirtyEight - Ownership and Business Overview | Mergr
snippet: Who owns FiveThirtyEight? FiveThirtyEight is owned by ABC News. It was acquired on April 18, 2018.

title: FiveThirtyEight joins ABC News - ABC News
snippet: ABC News announced today it has reached an agreement in principle to acquire the renowned data journalism organization FiveThirtyEight from ESPN.
